vestige-of-yimyar.moduleDescription: Implements the Vestige of Yimyar archetype including Vestige's Toll mechanics and healing redirection.

enableVisualEffects.name: Enable Visual Effects
enableVisualEffects.hint: Add visual indicators to tokens affected by Vestige's Toll

showToolbarButtons.name: Show Toolbar Buttons
showToolbarButtons.hint: Add Vestige's Toll and Rest buttons to the token controls toolbar

includeInCombatTracker.name: Show Vestige Status in Combat Tracker
includeInCombatTracker.hint: Display Vestige's Toll status in the combat tracker

configMenu.name: Vestige Configuration
configMenu.label: Configure Vestige Options
configMenu.hint: Configure advanced options for the Vestige of Yimyar module

toll.title: Vestige's Toll
toll.notes: Vestige's Toll reduces your hit points but provides temporary HP. Healing will refill your temporary HP instead of regular HP until your next rest.

rest.title: Take a Rest
rest.restDescription: This will restore spell slots, focus points, and other daily resources.
rest.hpRecovery: You will naturally recover {recovery} HP from rest.
rest.convertibleAmount: You can convert up to {amount} temporary HP to regular HP.

messages.tollPaid: {name} pays a Vestige's Toll of {amount} HP and gains {amount} temporary HP.
messages.tollReminder: Remember: Hit points lost this way cannot be healed except by resting, and healing received fills temporary hit points instead.
messages.lifeEssenceSpent: {name}'s life essence is permanently spent. They fall unconscious, and their doomed value increases to {doomed}.
messages.soulSpent: {name}'s doomed value has reached 4. They begin to disappear in a shimmering white light over the course of a minute. They can freely converse during this time but cannot be resurrected except by a 10th-level ritual such as Wish.
messages.tollConversion: Additionally, {amount} temporary HP from Vestige's Toll was converted to regular HP.
messages.healingRedirected: Healing redirected to temporary HP for {name} due to Vestige's Toll
messages.healingRedirectedDetail: {name}'s healing of {amount} HP is redirected to temporary HP due to Vestige's Toll.

notifications.selectToken: Please select a token or assign a character to your user
notifications.pf2eOnly: This feature only works with PF2e character actors
notifications.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid amount greater than 0
notifications.noVestigeToll: {name} does not have active Vestige's Toll effects
notifications.noTempHP: {name} has no temporary HP to convert

dashboard.noVestiges: No characters currently under Vestige's Toll effect.
